com.complexible.common.io
Interface Directory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDirectory, DiskDirectory, MemDirectory
public interface Directory

A Directory is responsible for the management of all the IOFiles in a certain location.

Since:
0.3
Author:
Pedro Oliveira

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close this Directory and possibly all of its IOFiles
 void copyFile(String theOrigin, String theDestination)
           
 boolean deleteFile(String theName)
          Delete the IOFile with the given name
 boolean fileExists(String theName)
          Check if the IOFile with the given name exists
 IOFile getFile(String theName, IOFile.Mode theMode)
          Get the IOFile with the given name and mode, with this Directory default length
 IOFile getFile(String theName, IOFile.Mode theMode, long theLength)
          Get the IOFile with the given name, mode, and length
 long getFileLength(String theName)
          Get the length of the IOFile with the given name
 String[] getFilenames()
          Get the filenames of all the IOFiles in this Directory
 String getTempFilename()
          Get an atomic filename for an unused temporary IOFile
 void moveFile(String theOrigin, String theDestination)
          Move the IOFile with the given origin name into a new IOFile with the given destination name, maintaining the origin one.
